languages.text: {n}Вы ощущаете пристальное внимание — не только этой сущности, но и Губительных сил. Ваша отмеченная {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}проклятьем варпа душа{/d} стала уязвимее из-за ритуала, и демоны царапают тонкую вуаль, желая добраться до вас.{/n}

{n}You sense the attention of something else, something beyond this entity... the Ruinous Powers. The ritual has made your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}soul, marked as it is by the curse of the warp{/d}, more vulnerable than ever before. You can feel the daemons clawing at the thin veil, hungering to reach you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы ощущаете пристальное внимание — не только этой сущности, но и Губительных сил. Ваша отмеченная {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}проклятьем варпа душа{/d} стала уязвимее из-за ритуала, и демоны царапают тонкую вуаль, желая добраться до вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You sense the attention of something else, something beyond this entity... the Ruinous Powers. The ritual has made your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}soul, marked by the curse of the warp{/d}, more vulnerable than ever before, and you can feel daemons clawing at the thin veil, hungering to reach you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du spürst die Aufmerksamkeit von etwas anderem, jenseits dieser Wesenheit ... die Mächte der Zerstörung. Das Ritual hat deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}mit dem Fluch des Warps belegte Seele{/d} verwundbarer denn je gemacht. Du spürst die Dämonen, die an dem dünnen Schleier zerren, um zu dir zu gelangen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sense the attention of something else, something beyond this entity... the Ruinous Powers. The ritual has made your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}soul, marked as it is by the curse of the warp{/d}, more vulnerable than ever before. You can feel the daemons clawing at the thin veil, hungering to reach you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du spürst die Aufmerksamkeit von etwas anderem, jenseits dieser Wesenheit ... die Mächte der Zerstörung. Das Ritual hat deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}mit dem Fluch des Warps belegte Seele{/d} verwundbarer denn je gemacht. Du spürst die Dämonen, die an dem dünnen Schleier zerren, um zu dir zu gelangen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous percevez l'attention de quelque chose d'autre, caché derrière cette entité... les Puissances de la Ruine. Le rituel a rendu votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}âme, marquée par la malédiction du Warp{/d}, plus vulnérable que jamais. Vous sentez d'ici les démons s'attaquer au voile ténu qui vous sépare dans le but de vous atteindre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sense the attention of something else, something beyond this entity... the Ruinous Powers. The ritual has made your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}soul, marked as it is by the curse of the warp{/d}, more vulnerable than ever before. You can feel the daemons clawing at the thin veil, hungering to reach you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous percevez l'attention de quelque chose d'autre, caché derrière cette entité... les Puissances de la Ruine. Le rituel a rendu votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}âme, marquée par la malédiction du Warp{/d}, plus vulnérable que jamais. Vous sentez d'ici les démons s'attaquer au voile ténu qui vous sépare dans le but de vous atteindre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sientes la atención de algo más, aparte de este ser... Los Poderes Ruinosos. El ritual ha hecho que tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}alma, marcada por la maldición de la disformidad{/d}, sea más vulnerable que nunca. Sientes que los daemons arañan el débil velo, intentando alcanzarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sense the attention of something else, something beyond this entity... the Ruinous Powers. The ritual has made your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}soul, marked as it is by the curse of the warp{/d}, more vulnerable than ever before. You can feel the daemons clawing at the thin veil, hungering to reach you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sientes la atención de algo más, aparte de este ser... Los Poderes Ruinosos. El ritual ha hecho que tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}alma, marcada por la maldición de la disformidad{/d}, sea más vulnerable que nunca. Sientes que los daemons arañan el débil velo, intentando alcanzarte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは他の何か、この存在を超えた何か…〈禍つ神々〉の気配を感じる。儀式によって、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}<歪み>に痕跡を残されたあなたの魂{/d}は、かつてないほど傷つきやすくなっている。ディーモンがあなたを求めて手を伸ばさんと、薄いヴェールをひっかいているのを感じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sense the attention of something else, something beyond this entity... the Ruinous Powers. The ritual has made your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}soul, marked as it is by the curse of the warp{/d}, more vulnerable than ever before. You can feel the daemons clawing at the thin veil, hungering to reach you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは他の何か、この存在を超えた何か…〈禍つ神々〉の気配を感じる。儀式によって、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}<歪み>に痕跡を残されたあなたの魂{/d}は、かつてないほど傷つきやすくなっている。ディーモンがあなたを求めて手を伸ばさんと、薄いヴェールをひっかいているのを感じる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你感觉到有其他东西在注视着你，某种超越现实的东西……那是毁灭之力。这个仪式{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}带着亚空间的诅咒，在你的灵魂上留下了烙印{/d}。你感觉你的灵魂比以往任何时候都更加脆弱。你感觉到恶魔在撕扯着薄薄的障壁，渴望向你涌来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sense the attention of something else, something beyond this entity... the Ruinous Powers. The ritual has made your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}soul, marked as it is by the curse of the warp{/d}, more vulnerable than ever before. You can feel the daemons clawing at the thin veil, hungering to reach you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你感觉到有其他东西在注视着你，某种超越现实的东西……那是毁灭之力。这个仪式{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}带着亚空间的诅咒，在你的灵魂上留下了烙印{/d}。你感觉你的灵魂比以往任何时候都更加脆弱。你感觉到恶魔在撕扯着薄薄的障壁，渴望向你涌来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu varlığın da ötesindeki bir şeylerin ilgisini seziyorsun. Yıkıcı Güçler... Ayin, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}hâlihazırda öteboyut lanetiyle işaretlenmiş ruhunu{/d} hiç olmadığı kadar saldırıya açık hâle getirdi. İncecik örtüye pençelerini vurarak sana ulaşmayı arzulayan iblisleri hissedebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sense the attention of something else, something beyond this entity... the Ruinous Powers. The ritual has made your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}soul, marked as it is by the curse of the warp{/d}, more vulnerable than ever before. You can feel the daemons clawing at the thin veil, hungering to reach you.{/n}
